title: HEXTECH CRAFTING CHAMPION REROLL CRASH.
body: I have been collecting champion shards so i can reroll them into a new champ, and when i tried to reroll yesterday, my client crashed and i got NOTHING. that's about 5100 ip i WASTED. so many games gone to waste. RITO FIX THIS PLEASE. anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
This issue happens rarely, and is usually linked to a hiccup in your connection to our servers. I took a look at your account and your reroll resulted in permanently unlocking Orianna. 

Let me know if you have any other questions.
